        Convert a list of settlement states into total from each obligor to a beneficiary.

        Returns:
        a map of obligor/beneficiary pairs to the balance due.

      • sumAmountsDue

        @NotNull
public static <P extends AbstractParty,T> java.util.Map<P,java.lang.Long> sumAmountsDue(@NotNull
                                                                                                 java.util.Map<kotlin.Pair,net.corda.core.contracts.Amount> balances)

        Calculate the total balance movement for each party in the transaction, based off a summary of balances between each obligor and beneficiary.

        Type Parameters:
        P -

        type of party to operate on.

        T -

        token that balances represent

        Parameters:
        balances - payments due, indexed by obligor and beneficiary. Zero balances are stripped from the map before beingreturned.
